pageContext.claim: “And then he cried. When they caught him, he cried like a baby. Like a baby. When Jimmy Swaggart cried, it was nothing compared to Da Nang Richard.”
pageContext.analysis: Sen. Richard Blumenthal on a few occasions before his first Senate race in 2010 said or implied he had served in Vietnam, when he hadn't. But Trump seems to have fabricated a bunch of anecdotes and statements that Blumenthal never uttered. He did not cry at the news conference where he addressed his prior statements about Vietnam.
